ModMetaData.name: Replace Stuff Mod Compatibility - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Garethp
ModMetaData.description:
A patch for Replace Stuff to introduce compatibility for various mods. Replace ship walls and reactors without having to remove them first
Mods included in this patch so far are: * Save Our Ship 2 * Vanilla Furniture Expanded (Core) * Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security * Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power * Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Production
(This is the dev version of Replace Stuff. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
